comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in a vertical layout, with small seal script characters alongside larger regular script explanations. The content appears to be from an ancient dictionary or lexicographical work, possibly a version of the *Shuowen Jiezi*. It includes entries with definitions, phonetic annotations (e.g., '切'), and etymological notes. The right margin contains column headers: '小篆' (small seal script), '說文十三上' (Shuowen Jiezi, Volume 13, Upper), '十六' (sixteen), and '陸安' (Lu An, likely a publisher or editor).
